item.title: Pommerman
item.description: Based off the classic game Bomberman, my team of 8 people tackle how agents acomplish tasks with infinitely meaningful variations through competitive multi-agent learning. We split our team into two teams, Pytorch and TensorForce, with the goal of seeing if different frameworks lead to different results but trying the same algorithms being PPO and A2C. Utilizes pre-existing architecture and code from Pommerman Competition as cited below. Pommerman Competition
